request.description: Create a new customer with EMI details. Token is automatically assigned from available tokens. EMI per month is automatically calculated based on (product_price - down_payment) / emi_duration_months.
Get detailed information about a specific customer including EMI calculations and addresses.
Update customer status to approved/rejected. Include rejection_reason if rejecting.
Get customer statistics including counts by status and total loan amounts.
Upload customer documents including NID, photo, and guarantor documents.
Delete a customer and all associated data (installments, documents). Only creator or admin can delete. Permanently removes all customer records.
Get all active divisions for address selection.
Get all active districts for a specific division.
Get all active upazillas for a specific district.
Get dashboard statistics. Super admins get global stats, others get personal stats.

item.name: Reports

request.description: Generate a report based on type and date range. Available types: sales, installments, collections, products, customers, dealers, sub-dealers. Optional dealer_id for dealer-specific reports.
Download report as PDF. Same parameters as Generate Report. Returns PDF file for download.
Get list of dealers for report filtering. Returns dealers based on user hierarchy - Super Admin sees all, others see their subordinates.

query.description: Optional - filter sub-dealers by specific dealer

request.description: Get list of sub-dealers for report filtering. Optional dealer_id parameter to filter sub-dealers by specific dealer.

item.description: Report generation and download endpoints. Supports 7 report types: Sales, Installments, Collections, Products, Customers, Dealers, and Sub-Dealers. All reports can be previewed or downloaded as PDF.

request.description: Test API connectivity and get Laravel version info.
Health check endpoint for monitoring service status.
Debug endpoint to view all users with roles (development environment only).
Debug endpoint to view all roles and permissions (development environment only).

item.name: Device Control

request.description: Register device with FCM token. Public endpoint - no authentication required. Device finds customer by IMEI1 match.
Get device information for a specific customer including device status and capabilities.
Lock the customer's device remotely via FCM.
Unlock the customer's device remotely via FCM.
Disable device camera remotely.
Enable device camera remotely.
Disable device bluetooth remotely.
Enable device bluetooth remotely.
Hide an app on the device. Package name is optional - hides the EMI manager app if not provided.
Unhide an app on the device. Package name is optional.
Set or reset device lock screen password remotely.
Remove device lock screen password.
Reboot the device remotely.
Uninstall an app from the device remotely. Requires package name.
Wipe device data (factory reset). USE WITH CAUTION - this will erase all data!
Show a custom message on the device screen. Supports Bangla text.
Show a full-screen reminder that user must acknowledge. Supports Bangla text.
Play a reminder audio on the device. Audio URL is optional - plays default reminder if not provided.
Set device wallpaper to a custom image (e.g., payment reminder). Requires image URL.
Remove custom wallpaper and restore default.
Request device's current GPS location. Device will send location back to server.
Enable phone calls on the device. Unlocks call functionality.
Disable phone calls on the device. Blocks all call functionality as a payment reminder.
Lock USB port on the device. Disables all USB functionality to prevent unauthorized data transfer.
Unlock USB port on the device. Enables USB functionality for data transfer and charging.
Get command history for a specific customer's device. Shows all sent commands with status.
Get list of all available device control commands with their parameters and descriptions.

item.description: Device control and management endpoints using Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM). Includes device registration and 21 remote control commands: lock/unlock, camera enable/disable, bluetooth enable/disable, hide/unhide app, password management, reboot, app removal, wipe device, notification messages, wallpaper control, location tracking, and call control.

item.name: Preset Messages

request.description: Get all preset messages for the authenticated user. Returns list of preset messages with their command, title, message content, and active status.

Get list of all commands that support preset messages. Returns 18 commands: LOCK_DEVICE, UNLOCK_DEVICE, DISABLE_CAMERA, ENABLE_CAMERA, DISABLE_BLUETOOTH, ENABLE_BLUETOOTH, HIDE_APP, UNHIDE_APP, RESET_PASSWORD, REMOVE_PASSWORD, REBOOT_DEVICE, REMOVE_APP, WIPE_DEVICE, SET_WALLPAPER, REMOVE_WALLPAPER, REQUEST_LOCATION, ENABLE_CALL, DISABLE_CALL.
Create or update preset message for LOCK_DEVICE command. This message will automatically display on the device when lock command is executed.
Create or update preset message for UNLOCK_DEVICE command. This thank you message will automatically display when device is unlocked.
Create or update preset message for DISABLE_CALL command. This message will automatically display when call functionality is disabled.
Create or update preset message for REQUEST_LOCATION command. This message will automatically display when location is requested.
Get details of a specific preset message by ID. User can only view their own preset messages.
Update an existing preset message. Can update title, message content, and active status. User can only update their own preset messages.
Toggle the active status of a preset message. Switches between active (true) and inactive (false) without deleting the message.
Permanently delete a preset message. User can only delete their own preset messages.

item.description: Preset message management for automatic message delivery when device commands are executed. Users can create custom messages for 18 different commands that will automatically display on customer devices. Includes full CRUD operations and toggle functionality.
